title: repl.it
subtitle: Original Portfolio
text: This site has been deprecated. It was my first portfolio website and everything was built from scratch. I learned a lot but would definitely employ more dynamic construction now.

title: github.io
subtitle: Portfolio Mirror Site
text: This mirror currently hosts the last pushed version of the repl.it portfolio site. It will be changed to host this site once it is ready.

title: Personally Hosted
subtitle: Running from

images.title: I host it on a Raspberry Pi

text: This is a server I run from my house, I use a subdomain from FreeDNS. I use it for multiple projects such as as a remote camera, as a website host, and as a domain redirect.
